title: EFL Critical Thinking Development Program for Adult Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English communication skills and basic experience in writing business reports
context.additional_context: A program for corporate employees in managerial/leadership roles to strengthen job competencies. Requires content design accessible in limited mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can write analytical essays of over 500 words on controversial topics on a weekly basis
Learners can identify and propose corrections for three or more types of logical fallacies through a peer feedback system.
Learners can iteratively improve and finalize an essay draft at least three times using mobile device-based editing tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
